meanings.definition: A synthetic estrogen used in oral contraceptives.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed mestranol to regulate hormone levels.
meanings.sent2: Many women take mestranol as part of their birth control pills.
meanings.sent3: When the hormones danced wildly, mestranol stepped in to lead the calm.
meanings.sent4: Her body welcomed mestranol like a gentle breeze on a hot day.
meanings.sent5: The pharmacy shelves gleamed with boxes of mestranol, promising balance.

meanings.sent1: Taking mestranol daily helps prevent unwanted pregnancies.
meanings.sent2: The effectiveness of mestranol in stopping ovulation is well-known.
meanings.sent3: In the land of eggs, mestranol stood guard, keeping them safe.
meanings.sent4: Her ovaries sighed in relief as mestranol kept them at rest.
meanings.sent5: Mestranol acted like a gatekeeper, denying entry to any wandering sperm.
